name: EVENTIDE 24
notes:
Plans appeared in Yachting Monthly magazine (1957). (The designer was editor at the time). It was an immediate success with amateur and professional builders alike. Some time later, plans for a 26' version were issued. Draft for fin keel version: 4.5'. A production Glass Fiber (26') version, with a standard trunk cabin, appeared in 1962.
